name: FingAAH!
description:
Let your knife talk between your fingers, take the minds of people at the bar, grab the points and show'em who the boss is!

FingAAH! is an act of breathtaking reflex. Easy to learn but hard to master. Challange your friends and even the World!

What say you, now? Do you have the courage?

---
Have a problem/bug? So, write to us (games@siis.com.tr) please.
